abstract_ssm: John Michael Lucid (1915-1977) fought with the International Brigades in the Spanish Civil War from February 1937 through December 1938. Lucid joined the U.S. Army in 1942, and was stationed in the U.S., North Africa, and Italy. The collection consists of letters from Lucid to another Spanish Civil War veteran written while Lucid was in the Army.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
